# The `DIEAbbrev` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

### Children {#ad5ce9c4ed07e2d8203ae9ee9f7a20700}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::DIEAbbrev::Children">
Whether or not this node has children.

This cheats a bit in all of the uses since the values in the standard are 0 and 1 for no children and children respectively.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/die-h/#l00090">90</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/die-h">DIE.h</a>.
